nodes.text: The 97R enhanced blaster actuating module was a model of blaster actuating module available in the period after the Battle of Yavin during the Galactic Civil War between the Alliance to Restore the Republic and the Galactic Empire. The module was produced by the company Arakyd Industries and cost 500, increasing the power and penetration of shots from the blaster pistol it was used in.
The 97R enhanced blaster actuating module was first mentioned in the Star Wars: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2013.
